DOC.brief_summary: Investigate Safety Efficacy Two Concentrations DE-110 Compared Placebo Treatment Dry Eye Disease
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study DE-110 Ophthalmic Suspension Treatment Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis dry eye Not wear contact lenses study 18 year old Understand provide write consent Negative pregnancy test use acceptable method contraception Use topical ocular medication Any type ocular surgery Diagnosis ongoing ocular infection and/or allergic conjunctivitis Uncontrolled systemic conditions/lid abnormality Corneal transplant Females pregnant , nurse plan pregnancy Participation another drug trial concurrently within 30 day prior study
